urgent.action: Fix HTTP→HTTPS redirect: http://www.konacoffeedonut.com/en is indexed separately with 101 impressions and 0 clicks. Add 301 redirect from HTTP to HTTPS in Vercel config or middleware, then request URL removal of HTTP version in GSC.
urgent.reasoning: 101 impressions (22% of total) are being wasted on an HTTP URL that ranks at position 10.8 instead of consolidating into the HTTPS version. Fixing this could nearly double homepage impressions and improve ranking.

urgent.action: The About Kona Coffee page has 40 impressions at position #87 with 0 clicks. Rewrite title tag and meta description with targeted keywords like 'Kona coffee Waikiki' and 'Hawaiian coffee shop'. Add internal links from homepage.
urgent.reasoning: Position 87 means Google sees the content but doesn't rank it well. The page needs substantial on-page SEO improvement.

urgent.action: Menu page has 37 impressions but only 2.7% CTR despite position #1.9. Rewrite meta title to 'Donuts & Coffee Menu | Kona Coffee Donut Waikiki' and add compelling meta description with menu highlights.
urgent.reasoning: Position ~2 should yield 15-20% CTR, not 2.7%. Fixing this could yield 4-6 additional clicks per week.

quickWins.action: Add 'donuts near me' and 'best donuts in Waikiki' to homepage H1/H2 tags, meta description, and body content. Ensure Google Business Profile is claimed and optimized.
quickWins.reasoning: At position #10, this keyword is on the edge of page 1. Moving to top 5 could increase CTR from 5.9% to 15-20%.

quickWins.action: Create or optimize a landing section targeting 'donut shops in Waikiki'. Add structured data (LocalBusiness schema).
quickWins.reasoning: Position #11.2 with 5 impressions — just off page 1. Small content tweaks and schema markup could push this onto page 1.

quickWins.action: Add 'coffee near me' and 'coffee shop Waikiki' to relevant pages. Ensure NAP consistency across all local directories.
quickWins.reasoning: Position #20.4 is within striking distance. Local SEO signals will help most here.

quickWins.action: Optimize homepage title tag to 'Kona Coffee Donut | Donuts & Coffee in Waikiki, Hawaii'.
quickWins.reasoning: Position #13.2 for a generic high-volume term. Small on-page improvements can help.

opportunities.action: Create dedicated Korean-language landing pages targeting '말라사다 도넛', '와이키키 도넛', '하와이 카페'. Add hreflang tags for ko.
opportunities.reasoning: Korea accounts for 31 impressions (7%) and '말라사다 도넛' already has 25% CTR. Korean tourists are a massive Waikiki demographic.

opportunities.action: Create Japanese-language pages targeting 'ワイキキ ドーナツ', 'コナコーヒー ハワイ'. Add hreflang tags for ja.
opportunities.reasoning: Japan accounts for 18 impressions (4%). Japanese tourists are the second-largest international visitor group to Waikiki.

opportunities.action: Claim and fully optimize Google Business Profile before Feb 25 opening. Build citations on Yelp, TripAdvisor, Foursquare.
opportunities.reasoning: Local pack results dominate 'near me' searches. Without a strong GBP, organic rankings alone won't capture local intent traffic.

opportunities.action: Create blog content: 'best malasada in Waikiki', 'Kona coffee vs regular coffee', 'what to eat in Waikiki 2026'.
opportunities.reasoning: Building topical authority will support rankings for all target keywords.

opportunities.action: Audit mobile page speed and UX. Mobile has only 34% of impressions vs 60% desktop — unusual for local food.
opportunities.reasoning: Local food searches are predominantly mobile. The desktop-heavy split suggests potential mobile indexing issues.

insights.observation: Brand keyword 'kona coffee donut' has 25.7% CTR at position #1.1 — strong pre-opening brand recognition.
insights.suggestion: Protect and amplify brand searches. Ensure all brand SERPs show rich results.

insights.observation: Desktop dominates at 59.8% vs mobile 34%. For a local food business, this ratio should be inverted.
insights.suggestion: Investigate mobile rankings separately in GSC. Check Core Web Vitals for mobile. HTTP redirect may disproportionately affect mobile.

insights.observation: 11% of impressions come from Korea and Japan combined — strong tourist search interest pre-opening.
insights.suggestion: Invest in multilingual SEO now. First-mover advantage in Korean/Japanese donut shop content for Waikiki is substantial.

insights.observation: 34 clicks and 450 impressions for a shop that hasn't opened yet is strong. 49 keywords indexed across 13 pages.
insights.suggestion: Add opening countdown, email signup, and 'grand opening' structured event. Convert anticipation to foot traffic on Feb 25.

insights.observation: HTTP URL + low-CTR About page account for 31% of impressions with zero clicks.
insights.suggestion: Fixing HTTP redirect and improving About page could recover 141 impressions, potentially adding 10-15 clicks/week.
